coupon

Recursos

Recurso Descrição
POST /api/rnb/pvt/archive/coupon/{id} Arquivar um cupom
POST /api/rnb/pvt/unarchive/coupon/{id} Desarquivar um cupom
GET /api/rnb/pvt/coupon Retornar todos cupons
GET /api/rnb/pvt/archive/coupon Retorna todos cupons arquivados
GET /api/rnb/pvt/coupon/{id} Retona um cupom pelo id
POST /api/rnb/pvt/coupon Salva um cupom
GET /api/rnb/pub/validateCoupon/{coupon}/{profileId} Validar um cupom

Arquivar um cupom

URL do Recurso:

POST /api/rnb/pvt/archive/coupon/{id} HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de requisição:

"d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d"

Status codes: 204 NoContent

Desarquivar um cupom

URL do Recurso:

POST /api/rnb/pvt/unarchive/coupon/{id} HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de requisição:

"d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d"

Status codes: 204 NoContent

Retornar todos cupons

URL do Recurso:

GET /api/rnb/pvt/coupon HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de retorno:

[
  {
    "id": "d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d",
    "utmSource": "FESTA",
    "utmCampaign": "RIOSUL",
    "couponCode": "NATAL",
    "isArchived": true
  },
  {
    "id": "d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b3679",
    "utmSource": "FESTA-2",
    "utmCampaign": "RIOSUL-2",
    "couponCode": "NATAL-2",
    "isArchived": true
  }
]

Status codes: 200 OK

Retorna todos cupons arquivados

URL do Recurso:

GET /api/rnb/pvt/archive/coupon HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de retorno:

[
  {
    "id": "d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d",
    "utmSource": "FESTA",
    "utmCampaign": "RIOSUL",
    "couponCode": "NATAL",
    "isArchived": true
  },
  {
    "id": "d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b3679",
    "utmSource": "FESTA-2",
    "utmCampaign": "RIOSUL-2",
    "couponCode": "NATAL-2",
    "isArchived": true
  }
]

Status codes: 200 OK

Retona um cupom pelo id

URL do Recurso:

GET /api/rnb/pvt/coupon/{id} HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de requisição:

"d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d"

Exemplo de retorno:

{
  "id": "d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d",
  "utmSource": "FESTA",
  "utmCampaign": "RIOSUL",
  "couponCode": "NATAL",
  "isArchived": true
}

Status codes: 200 OK

Salva um cupom

URL do Recurso:

POST /api/rnb/pvt/coupon HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de requisição:

{
  "id": "d22146eb-76c3-42d0-83c7-cf778c1b365d",
  "utmSource": "FESTA",
  "utmCampaign": "RIOSUL",
  "couponCode": "NATAL",
  "isArchived": true
}

Exemplo de retorno:

"Saved!"

Status codes: 200 OK

Validar um cupom

URL do Recurso:

GET /api/rnb/pub/validateCoupon/{coupon}/{profileId} HTTP/1.1

Exemplo de retorno:

{
  "StatusName": "Available",
  "Status": 2
}

Status codes: 200 OK
